title: Baby Carrier
description: black silk square with green silk circle medallion, surrounded by abstract shapes and triangle corners; all embroidery in floral satin stitch, metallic and multicolor; bordered in embrodery and appliqued strips; bottom center strip is brilliant pink, green and purple; bottom flap and wide strap holders are piped in brown
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
